description.value:
Contact with the black blood of Orv—by you or one of your ancestors—transformed your bloodline. This necromantic taint in your blood mutates you into something peculiar.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{Diehard}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{Endurance}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.to1cdmyh5rtfyg2s]{Chill Touch} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wifi44l62ymqdvt8]{Unshakable Chill} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q35l6m4pggb4y98v]{Elemental Aura} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{Black Tentacles} (16th)
